summaries.description: Multifaceted software developer with over 20 years of experience focused on creating market dominating applications. Proven ability to leverage full-stack knowledge and experience to build user-centric Web applications. Extensive expertise in delivering enterprise software applications within Agile methodologies. Experience facilitating cutting-edge solutions for business applications. Excellent soft skills and a collaborative, team-oriented approach. Innovative problem solver willing to adopt new solutions better suited to the business goals. Diverse skill set across a wide range of technologies.

jobs.title: Front-end Architect / Team Lead / Senior Software Engineer
accomplishments: Led development of a variety of enterprise Web-based applications
Provided full-stack (MS Stack), full lifecycle development within an Agile scrum environment
Refined complex business needs into detailed software requirements
Converted old ASP.NET Web Forms application to an Angular PWA front-end and .NET Core Web API
Wrote stored procedures
Updated OAuth2 OIDC authentication app
Met with CTO, CPO, product owners and designers to provide feedback regarding the technical feasibility and usability of UI designs
Coached UI/UX team on principles of patterned design and component reuse
Communicated company directives and expectations to team members
Produced company coding standards and best practices documents for front-end development
Provided CSS, Typescript and Angular support for over 50 software engineers
Established a monorepo of common UI code (components, services, themes, etc.) to promote DRY code and move the company from design-per-app to design-by-standards

jobs.title: Lead Developer / Partner
accomplishments: Led a development team in creating and supporting a wide variety of retail software products
Programmed in C# and T-SQL
Created, updated and maintained several Microsoft Visio extensions
Implemented XML Web services for a variety of products
Created a Microsoft Retail Management System extension
Developed an industry master catalog based on SQL Server
Built a 3D rendering and physics engine
Designed an XNA game that utilized a MS Visio level editor as a proof of concept for the MS Visio team

jobs.title: Owner / Web Developer
accomplishments: Formed an S-corporation that provided interactive Web design and application development for clients
Used ASP.NET, PHP, Flash, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL for implementing designs created in Photoshop, Illustrator and Visio
Gained invaluable experience managing projects, time and budgets

jobs.title: Junior Programmer
accomplishments: Created UI for online B2B auction site using classic ASP and Flash
Developed XML socket services

jobs.title: Tech Lead
accomplishments: Developed marketing websites, e-learning and e-commerce applications for clients using ASP, Flash, XML sockets, and SQL Server

jobs.title: Junior Programmer
accomplishments: Worked as a programmer on a travel services and e-commerce site using Perl, Oracle, ASP and SQL Server
Great American Teach-In presenter
Career shadowing mentor
Enterprise Village chaperone
Tech Support for annual conference
Marketing, art and illustration design
IT Chairperson - set up file sharing, email, software services
Web, marketing, art and illustration design
General volunteer
Art and illustration design
Prison ministry
Music ministry
Fellowship host and study leader
RCS Food Pantry
Beach cleanup
Marketing, art and illustration design
General volunteer
